channel.title: chakra on David Wesst
channel.description: Recent content in chakra on David Wesst

item.title: Why ChakraCore OSS is Important
item.description: Chakra is the new JavaScript engine developed by Microsoft, which was first released as part of the, no longer supported Internet Explorer 9. This isn’t a post about why Microsoft having more open source software (OSS) processes and projects is important, or how it is “amazing” that they are turning a new leaf. This post answers the question that I don’t see people asking: why is having a OSS JavaScript engine important to anyone?
